content.html: Yesterday‚Äôs quote felt like a gut-punch from my calendar, after the week I‚Äôve had. Then FunkyPlaid pointed out that we‚Äôre related to the author. What an odd set of coincidences.

Yesterday‚Äôs quote felt like a gut-punch from my calendar, after the week I‚Äôve had. Then FunkyPlaid pointed out that we‚Äôre related to the author. What an odd set of coincidences.
 January 13 from the 2023 Tiny Buddha calendar has this quote: If you died today, what do you want those closest to you to know? Do they know how you feel about them? How much they mean to you? Do they understand how important they are to you? Tell them. Leave nothing unsaid. You never know if today is your last. (Bridget Layne)
